![](skyline.jpg)
Transform your R plots and graphics with the magical colors of Sailor Moon!

Project inspired by the [Wes Anderson Palettes](https://github.com/karthik/wesanderson) package.

## Install

```r
devtools::install_github("morgansleeper/SailorMoonR")
```

## Using SailorMoonR

```{r, usage, fig.height=2, fig.width=10}
#Loading SailorMoonR
library(SailorMoonR)

# See all available palettes
MoonPaletteEnumeration

# Use a palette
inthenameofthemoon("MoonPrismPower")

# See a sample swatch for a palette
MoonPaletteIllumination("MoonPrismPower")
```

SailorMoonR currently has 12 palettes, ranging from 4-7 colors each:
